author: joern
msg: OPENNLP-636 Removed usage of Class.forName from all non-deprecated methods. OpenNLP code base should be converted to use the new methods.

author: stefanegli
msg: SLING-3382 : introducing connector frequency backoff behavior: when a connector sends stable announcement, the servlet instructs the client to backoff, ie send with a higher heartbeatInterval, up to a configurable maximum, default is 5 times the heartbeatInterval
